This vignette provides instructions on how to connect to Yahoo Fantasy Sports by obtaining a league_id and token from a specific source and using them with the `yahoo_connect` function.

### Instructions

1. Obtain your league_id from any yahoo URL in your leagues.  In this link it's 77275: https://football.fantasysports.yahoo.com/f1/77275/10

2. Get your read_only auth token by signing into Yahoo here https://lemon-dune-0cd4b231e.azurestaticapps.net/.

3. In your R environment, call the `yahoo_connect` function using the obtained league_id and token as follows:

```r
library(ffscrapr)

# Replace "{league_id}" and "{token}" with your values
conn <- yahoo_connect(league_id = "{league_id}", token = "{token}")
